Dear Sir:
In connection with the editorial work on the third
edition of the Biographical directory of LEADERS IN EDUCATION,
we would appreciate it if you would send to us a recent list of
the membership of the National Association of Educational Broad¬
casters.
We shall be glad if you will place our name on your
mailing list os that we may receive subsequent revised lists.
Very truly yours,
THE SCIENCE PRESS
